appearances.snippet: he said al inspired him because john fetterman was at harvard when al was there as a professor. we have 150 members of her army national guard in jordan. went to see the king. he said i love wyoming, i love cody. please give the simpson family my deepest condolences. that is what this is all about. there is one single word that really defines al simpson and that word is integrity. and on the back of this program it says if you have integrity, nothing else matters. if you don't have integrity, nothing else matters. that word was so hooked to al simpson that wyoming whiskey made a special blend of whiskey called the integrity blend of whiskey. we should all have a shot tonight. they bottled it, put it in a bottle called integrity, al's face is on it along with his signature and his name. and that is the way he will always be remembered. let me close with this. if you come to my office in washington you will see a picture of al and ronald reagan in cheyenne in 1982 for a political rally. you will also see a picture of here on the university on the field john kennedy 1963. you will
